name: tm41
effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

flavor_text.black-white: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
